casebody.data:
DESMOND
v.
The NEWS & OBSERVER PUBLISHING COMPANY, et al. 132PA18-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 John A. Bussian, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Bradley R. Kutrow, Attorney at Law, •Charlotte, Julia C. Ambrose, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for The News And Observer Publishing Company, et al. James T. Johnson, Attorney at Law, Chynna T. Smith, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Desmond, Beth. William M. Wilson, III, Attorney at Law, for Professor William Van Alstyne. Jonathan E. Buchan, Attorney at Law, for The Reporters Committee for Freedom of Press, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of January 2019 by the Reporters Committee for Freedom of Press, et al. for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
